name: Subhi

personal_info.education: No university degree but strong technical leadership

professional_info.technical_focus: Backend-heavy full-stack developer with 7+ years of strong Django experience
professional_info.devops: Handles DevOps responsibilities but is not DevOps-focused; no dedicated DevOps team
professional_info.sdlc: Leads teams working within the full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)

leadership_style.empathetic_and_protective: Advocates for team, raises issues without blame, sensitive to leadership feedback
leadership_style.team_focused: Prioritizes team health, clear sprint planning, sustainable delivery over firefighting
leadership_style.pragmatic_communicator: Values clarity, directness, constructive conversations, frames issues as system/process problems
leadership_style.mentor_oriented: Supports growth of junior/mid-level engineers, delegates with care, encourages ownership
leadership_style.autonomy_enabling: Handles DevOps/infra as needed, bias toward action and responsibility
leadership_style.solution_driven: Emphasizes sustainable, long-term business solutions beyond coding

summary: Known for technical excellence, mentoring, clear communication, and solving root causes. Thrives in fast-paced environments with a mission to build resilient teams and deliver impactful solutions.
